explanation: The condition incorrectly used x>a+1, which makes the (A+1)-th ranked participant treated as guaranteed to get a T-shirt. It should check x>a so that ranks A+1 through B are in the random selection. I fixed the condition to if x>a and x<=b:.
fixed_code:
a,b,c,x=list(map(int,input().split()))
ans=1.0
if x>a and x<=b:
    ans=c/(b-a)
elif x>b:
    ans=0.0
print('%.10f'%ans)
